${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:WyrdStrike.NAME: Wyrd Strike
${modID}:WyrdStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Repeat as many times as the ${modID}:Delay of your primary orb.

${modID}:FireballSpell.NAME: Fireball
${modID}:FireballSpell.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Delay 2. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

${modID}:DevilPact.NAME: Devil Pact
${modID}:DevilPact.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 HP. NL ${modID}:Quicken 1. NL Add a copy of *Devil *Pact into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StaffSwipe.NAME: Staff Swipe
${modID}:StaffSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Swap. NL ${modID}:Quicken 1.

${modID}:SupernovaSpell.NAME: Supernova
${modID}:SupernovaSpell.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Delay 4. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Intensify 1 whenever you play an attack of cost at least 1.

${modID}:CometsSpell.NAME: Comets
${modID}:CometsSpell.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Delay 2. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

${modID}:Plummet.NAME: Plummet
${modID}:Plummet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 vulnerable. NL If the last card played this combat was a Skill, gain [E].
